headline: Barclays Downgraded Chubb (CB) Stock to Equal Weight
summary: Chubb Limited (NYSE:CB) is one of the Best Large Cap Value Stocks to Invest In. Barclays analyst Alex Scott downgraded the company’s stock to “Equal Weight” from “Overweight” with a price objective of $298, down from the prior target of $321, as reported by The Fly. Heading into earnings, the firm remains more cautious on the property and […]

headline: Chubb (CB) Earnings Expected to Grow: Should You Buy?
summary: Chubb (CB) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
